nodes.name: borrow-it
nodes.description: An online platform to lend stuff you don't need everyday or borrow things you don't want to buy. This is a full stack app built with Prisma, GraphQL Yoga, Apollo Client and NextJS.

nodes.name: make-progress
nodes.description: Create a task. Say how much you wanna do. Read 12 chapters? Learn 4 hours? Add your progress every time you do something and have the best overview over your current status. Build with NodeJS at the server side, MongoDB as the database and NextJS as the frontend. (Still in development)
